author: maplesida (丹尼)
content:
(代PO)

公司名稱，統編(中華民國以外註冊可免填):
Dell Technologies

公司地址(填寫詳細至號):
No. 218, Section 2, Dunhua South Road, Da’an District, Taipei City, 106

職缺:
Entry level - Data Science Analyst


職缺能力經歷要求:
Entry level data scientist, need to know programming knowledge and
prior experience with data analytics preferred (e.g. python +pandas, etc)


員工是否需自備工具? (是/否) :
no


薪資(月薪):
entry level range (negotiable)

薪資/工時
14 months per year
8 hours a day

加班費:
based on company policy

工作環境與該職缺團隊介紹:
MNC environment, open culture

工作福利:
all benefits for full-time employee included


公司分紅與獎金:
based on company and individual performance

公司介紹:



人資或徵才聯絡方式:
Wayan Lee, 


Looking to hire entry level data scientist for Dell's Global Ops Strategy team.
Need to know programming knowledge and prior experience with data analytics
preferred (e.g. python +pandas, etc). If you know anyone,
please have them shoot me an email at 


--
